# Biogeochemistry Data

#Import
```{r}
#Load required packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

# Read in data set using read_csv and here funtions
# Convert column names to lower camel case using clean names
toolik_biochem <- read.csv(here::here("data", "2011_Kling_Akchem.csv"), na.strings = c(".", "")) %>% clean_names()
inlet_biochem <- toolik_biochem %>% 
  filter(site ==c("Toolik Inlet")) %>%
        select( c("p_h", "doc_u_m", "tdn_u_m"))

# Print mean of all columns manualy
print(paste("PH: ", mean(inlet_biochem[[1]], na.rm = TRUE)))
print(paste("Disolved Carbon: ", mean(inlet_biochem[[2]], na.rm = TRUE)))
print(paste("Disolved nitrogen: ", mean(inlet_biochem[[3]], na.rm = TRUE)))

# Print means using a for loop
for (i in seq_along(inlet_biochem)){
  mean <- mean(inlet_biochem[[i]], na.rm = TRUE)
  print(mean)
}

# Find means using th eapply function
apply(inlet_biochem, 2, mean, na.rm = TRUE)
```
